TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConsoleLogger extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.INodeLogger

Docs.summary: Implements the standard console logger that outputs event data to the console window during a build.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates an <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.BuildProjectFile%2A> method to build a project file. The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.FileLogger> class is used to log information to a file.
[!code-vb[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/BuildAProjectVB/Module1.vb#1)] [!code-cs[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/BuildAProjectCS/Program.cs#1)]

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the logger will display a summary of errors and warnings.
Docs.value: `true` if the logger will display a summary of errors and warnings; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

Docs.summary: Stops the logger and releases all resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default console logger does not need to release any resources. This method does nothing.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the logger will display messages when new projects are started during the build.
Docs.value: `true` to display messages when new projects are started during the build; otherwise, `false`. The default is `true`.
